text:
The last time Derek Carr and Davante Adams were teammates (at Fresno State):

2012
Adams: 102 rec, 1,312 rec yards, 14 rec TDs
Carr: 4,104 yards, 37 TDs, 7 INTs

2013
Adams: 131 rec, 1,719 rec yards, 24 rec TDs
Carr: 5,083 yards, 50 TDs, 8 INTs

Absolutely insane numbers

text:
Here's how the #Bucs WR depth chart shakes out now in SR's opinion ...

WR1 Evans
WR2 Godwin
WR3 Gage
WR4 Perriman
WR5 Grayson
WR6 Johnson
WR7 Miller
WR8 Darden

Bucs likely to keep 6 WRs and could draft another one. Could be tough for Johnson, Miller and Darden to make the team.

Perriman will compete for WR4. He's better than Tyler Johnson or Darden, and he's likely very cheap. He's been better in this offense than anywhere else, and he complements the current top 3 well. Fine with it.
